programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.sub-title: Pillow Talk: Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: Your 90 Day favourites invite you into their homes as they watch the latest episode of 'The Family Chantel'! David and Annie, Tom and Emma, Robert and Anny, and Tim and Veronica are watching along, and no one is holding back!

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: Pedro arrives in the Dominican Republic to make peace between his family members, only to make matters worse. Winter and Jah host a dinner for the family to reveal their engagement. River decides to introduce Karen and Chantel to his girlfriend.

programme.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Love in Paradise
programme.desc: Daniel drops a bomb on Amber after an amazing night together. Aryanna travels to Jamaica and is anxious about seeing Sherlon. Mark and Key have a passionate reunion and reminisce about old times. Martine pushes Steven to think beyond their vacation fun.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Tammy is back from rehab, and Amy kisses her freedom goodbye as she comes to a drastic decision regarding her sister. With his bariatric surgery on the line, Chris tries to shed the weight he's gained but is shocked when he and Tammy step on the scale.

programme.title: Down South Spirit
programme.desc: Free Kinlow is an Atlanta psychic and mom of three with a big personality and an even bigger heart. She receives messages everywhere, and no topic is off limits. Secrets and hidden traumas are revealed as she helps her clients move forward in their lives.

programme.title: I Am Jazz
programme.desc: Jazz turns 18 and starts making plans to move out of the house, much to Greg and Jeanette's dismay. Jazz also launches her own kids' day camp but worries her very first event will fail. The family plans a surprise outing to celebrate Jazz's birthday.

programme.title: I Am Jazz
programme.desc: Jazz travels to New York for a third surgery to correct defects caused by complications during her gender confirmation surgery. While in New York, Jazz attends the premiere of a film she starred in. The Jennings family celebrate the twins' 21st birthday.

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: Utah has decriminalized polygamy, and Christine toys with the idea of moving back. Meanwhile, coronavirus cases are rising, and Arizona goes into lockdown. Janelle tells Kody to stop coming over, and the whole family grapples with how to handle it all.

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: It's the month of birthdays in the Brown family, but COVID-19 has disrupted celebrations. With Kody and Meri not communicating, he's surprised to learn that Mariah and Audrey have gone to run the B&B to protect Meri's mom.

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: Kody finally returns to Janelle's house, but the larger family conflict over COVID-19 rules continues to grow. Then, it's Kody and Meri's 30th anniversary, and Kody shows no interest in rekindling a romance, despite Meri's intense interest.

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: The Brown family is having problems communicating, and when Janelle sets out to resolve things, it's apparent that maybe some things can't be fixed. Then, Robyn opens up to Kody about having more children.

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: The wives take sides as conflict grows over Kody's COVID-19 rules. Janelle attempts to improve communication but must overcome Kody's frustration. Then, Christine gathers the wives to pitch the idea that they all move back to Utah.

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: The pandemic is pulling the Brown family apart, and tensions rise. Kody refuses to travel with Christine for Ysabel's surgery. Then, Christine gathers the wives for a pitch to move back to Utah, which ends in tears as she questions her marriage to Kody.

programme.title: So Freakin Cheap
programme.desc: The Watsons get cheap engagement photos, and Ashley and Colby try to conceive. The Tran family enjoys a free round of golf. Becky Guiles looks for cheap ways to tear down a wall. The Claytons get their allowance and wash the family car.

programme.title: So Freakin Cheap
programme.desc: Shelley Watson finds inspiration for a cheap wedding venue, which doesn't sit well with Brittney. Tony Clayton ruins Angela and Cierra's girls' night. Rosanna Tran has a tense Mother's Day when her family cuts corners on pampering.

programme.title: So Freakin Cheap
programme.desc: Brittney and Shelley make amends as the wedding moves forward. Becky takes Jay on a date to make up for her cheapskate ways. Angela finally gets fed up with Tony's cheapness and tells him it's either her or the coins.

programme.title: So Freakin Cheap
programme.desc: The Watsons prepare for Brittney's bachelorette party. Becky struggles to spend money buying furniture. The Tran family finds a pet photographer for Charisma's modeling portfolio shoot. The Claytons go to (free) therapy to save their marriage.

programme.title: So Freakin Cheap
programme.desc: It's Brittney's wedding day, and anything could go wrong on just a $750 budget. Becky reveals the new room to Jay, plus a secret about the money. The Claytons celebrate their anniversary, but Tony may not find it in his wallet to make it memorable.

programme.title: Little People, Big World
programme.sub-title: Amy and Chris' Happily Ever After
programme.desc: As the wedding day approaches, Amy and Chris scramble to get everything done while Matt takes on a new project that puts stress on everyone. The Roloff clan gathers to celebrate the marriage of Chris and Amy, who hope everything goes off without a hitch.

programme.title: I Am Jazz
programme.desc: Revisit Jazz's story as she confronts incredible challenges growing up Transgender and navigates complicated medical choices, tough social situations, and dangerous opposition to the life she wants to live.

programme.title: 7 Little Johnstons
programme.desc: After settling into their new homes, Anna and Elizabeth host competing dinner parties. Jonah struggles to find a suitable apartment to rent.

programme.title: I Am Jazz
programme.desc: The finale of this two part special revisits Jazz's story as she strives to overcome complications from her bottom surgery, meets her first boyfriend, and struggles with mental health issues inflamed by the pressures surrounding what college to attend.

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: After rejecting Christine's idea of moving back to Utah, Kody checks in with Janelle and Robyn. Then, Kody says he now wants his own lot on the property, and the family discusses the possibility of spending the holidays apart.

programme.title: I Am Jazz
programme.desc: Jazz recovers from cosmetic revision surgery, but a month later, she faces another complication; Jeanette worries about Jazz choosing Pomona over Harvard; After breaking up with Ahmir, Jazz tries to make it work with Victoria, and Sander comes along, too.

programme.title: I Am Jazz
programme.desc: Jazz finds out that JoJo's grandmother will not support JoJo having top surgery; Jeanette celebrates her 53rd birthday with a consultation from a plastic surgeon; Jazz's feelings about Pomona College clash with her parents' desire for her to pick Harvard.

programme.title: My Feet Are Killing Me
programme.desc: Dr. Schaeffer has to straighten a woman's serpentine foot to reset her life, as Dr. Vincent gets a drummer's foot back on the beat.

programme.title: My Feet Are Killing Me
programme.desc: Nate sees Dr. Brad for help with the raging calluses on his feet. Savannah has a rare condition that made her big toe grow to an enormous size and hopes Dr. Ebonie can help. Dr. Brad is determined to uncover the mystery behind John's massive foot growth.

programme.title: My Feet Are Killing Me
programme.desc: Dr. Vincent tries to save a man's enormous toe, as Dr. Schaeffer has his hands full treating a little boy with big demands, and a man with incredibly long toes.

programme.title: My Feet Are Killing Me
programme.desc: Dr. Ebonie's skills are tested as she attempts to diagnose a patient with feet covered in huge masses. Dr. Brad is confronted with a dangerous case that could be related to the elephant man as well as a patient with paper thin skin.

programme.title: Cellblock 6: Female Lock Up
programme.desc: Eight unique women cope with their incarceration in Gwinnett County Jail.

programme.title: Cellblock 6: Female Lock Up
programme.desc: Nine women struggle to make sense of their time in jail and the actions that led to their incarceration. Four have just been arrested, three have been in and out of jail, one has been awaiting trial for five years and one is due to be released.

programme.title: Cellblock 6: Female Lock Up
programme.desc: A young mother faces the prospect of seeing her young son only through the visitation glass.

programme.title: Cellblock 6: Female Lock Up
programme.sub-title: It Was Supposed to Be a Happy Day
programme.desc: Two incarcerated heroin addicts turn to each other for support. A life of prostitution supports a young woman's drug habit.

programme.title: Cellblock 6: Female Lock Up
programme.desc: A young woman turns to drugs to cope with the pain of her divorce. Two cellmates support each other through daily life in prison.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.desc: Barbara's back lump became more noticeable after she lost 131 pounds. Bob has two painful bumps on his back. Hilda's depression is a result of the multitude of bumps on her eyelids. Art has one big bump on his head that he covers up with hats.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.desc: Tony has large growths on his nose that impair his breathing. Kevin has a bump in his jawline that is a 'lady deterrent.' Marie has an unsightly lump on her forehead that makes her a hermit. Tommy's leg bump makes it difficult for him to work.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.desc: Jen has substantial growths on her ears that cause her depression, pain, and vertigo. Juliet is under emotional distress because of the bumps all over her neck and chest. Gerald has a mysterious, kiwi-size lump on his middle finger.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.desc: Gerald is back to see Dr. Lee and a hand specialist about a huge, intrusive bump on his middle finger. Vinnie has a large, embarrassing birthmark on his neck. Leta has a lump on the back of her thigh.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.desc: Jaclyn has a lump on the back of her head that causes her emotional distress. Shane has a growth between his eyes that could put him in danger at his electrician job. Brittany has seen multiple doctors about the sores on her body with no answers.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Mike was born with a talent for sports - and an omnivorous appetite to match. After his football dreams were dashed by multiple concussions, he packed on over 700 pounds. Now he must find a new purpose in life to avoid succumbing to pain and regret.

programme.title: Too Large
programme.desc: George is a kind-hearted kindergarten teacher who weighs nearly 700 pounds. He is determined to lose weight to help him win back his ex-girlfriend. As George works hard to lose weight, he discovers that the love he has been missing most is self-love.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Lifelong secret eater Nikki finds her life and career as a costume designer threatened by immobility as her weight climbs to 650 pounds. In urgent need of drastic weight loss, she undergoes gastric bypass and confronts the emotional causes for her eating.

programme.title: I Am Jazz

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Amy undergoes gastric bypass surgery to change her life, but endangers herself by not sticking to the post-op diet. Tammy seeks support from her love interest, Jerry. Two months later, the sisters reveal the changes they've made to family and friends.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: While Amy reaps the benefits of weight-loss surgery, her sister Tammy worries that she gained weight during quarantine. A visit to urgent care gives Amy life-changing news. Tammy's family confronts her over her health.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Tammy and Amy blame each other for their issues in therapy. When Tammy gets devastating news from Dr. Procter, her brother Chris makes a life-altering decision. A very pregnant Amy can't stop overeating, and the results are disastrous.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Amy counts down the days until her delivery with an eccentric photo shoot, while the family worries that Jerry is derailing Tammy's diet. Tammy reveals her big secret to Jerry.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Amy gets unsettling news about the birth of her baby as her high-risk pregnancy has last-minute complications. With their next weigh-in ahead of them, Chris and Tammy are cautiously optimistic until Tammy steps on the scale.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters

programme.desc: The OPP manages a chaotic scene after a 30-vehicle pileup shuts down the 401. Mitch sets a tight deadline in his first job as leader of the heavy crew. When a semi smashes into a culvert, the Rosses try out their newest operator.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Parker breaks out Big Red to double his gold. Rick's wash plant disintegrates in front of his own eyes. Freddy Dodge spots of flaw in Fred's set up. Then, Dustin's crew is sent packing when an earthquake strikes. Later, Christo visits Rick's claim.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Parker returns to Promised Land but the claim owner's grandson threatens to derail a big pay day. Tony calls in his secret weapon to get down to pay at the new 80 pup cut. Fred risks destroying the new wash plant when hauling down a steep road.

programme.title: Gold Rush: White Water

programme.sub-title: The Twisted Bones in the Melted Truck
programme.desc: Booth and Brennan's next case leads them to a crime scene where a human carcass has literally melted into the dashboard of a charred truck.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSIs debunk the Amityville horror myth while investigating a mass murder at the infamous house on the south shore of Long Island.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and the team find a man stabbed to death in Madison Square Park and a woman shot dead on the steps of the Metropolitan Museum of Art. The CSIs soon realize that the two victims have a criminal past in common.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: When an Air France Concorde crashes in Paris just seconds after takeoff, a mysterious strip of metal discovered on the runway points investigators towards an unprecedented explanation for the crash.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Last year, Jamie ordered a state-of-the-art heavy rescue truck called a Rotator, but the busy winter season is here and the custom-built wrecker still hasn't been delivered. Jamie heads to the factory in Tennessee to bring it home himself.

programme.desc: Jamie's having second thoughts about bringing his son Brandon on-board; right-hand man Kevin shows up at a wreck without the gear he needs to control traffic and Jamie's one bright spot is his brand-new truck, the Rotator.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan gets a glimpse into her own life when the body of a brilliant and career-driven surgeon is found in a rough neighbourhood with multiple fractures to her skull and no indication as to how or why she was there.

programme.title: Bones

programme.desc: In possibly the strangest case in the history of forensic science, investigators must solve a murder case with a list of evidence consisting entirely of a single squashed tomato left at the crime scene, and tiny reflections of light in a photograph.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a woman dies after a long illness, investigators have to determine if her death was due to natural causes, suicide, or murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a woman is found dead in a ravine, police are stuck, as any evidence was washed away by storms. 20 years after the fact, an old hat and a tiny chip of metal put investigators back on the trail of a case long gone cold.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a bank president is found floating in a nearby lake, taped to a chair, forensic experts start piecing together the tape and discover a missing piece. It's this piece, and tips pouring in from residents, that will lead to a capture.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: To celebrate one year of marriage, a young couple goes on a camping trip. When the husband is shot and killed, the wife is so distraught she gives two different stories of what happened. When forensic psychiatry intervenes, the truth is finally learned.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman still haunted by her mother's disappearance 20 years before, decides to investigate herself. She finds her mother's old diary and discovers a grisly family secret that could explain just what happened to her mother.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A forensic scientist makes history when he uses material from a dentist's office to solve a 10-year-old crime involving an elderly couple that was brutally murdered during a robbery.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The victim had ingested a massive amount of cyanide. An unlikely clue, a flaw on a mailing envelope, exposed a murderer who was willing to kill innocent people to get the one person he wanted.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A tiny clue, no bigger than a thumbtack, held all the information investigators needed to put a trio of cold-blooded killers behind bars.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: It's not only a fingerprint which can link a killer to a crime; a shoe print can be just as telling. Armed with little else, police hoped the shoe impressions found at a Lansing, Michigan crime scene would put their investigation back on track.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a Philadelphia restaurateur is murdered, the police sift through the usual suspects to find his killer. They soon uncover a sprawling web of deceit and debt.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: To solve a case of triple homicide, investigators have to delve into the world of high rollers and offshore betting. With the help of forensics, they are able to bring down a killer who gambled, and lost.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: There are no clues to identify a body found along a rural road. Even after a determined detective finds the 'key' to identifying her, it takes a close analysis of a tire tread and a broken piece of jewellery to bring her killer to justice.

programme.title: Morning Express With Robin Meade
programme.desc: A daily dose of news, weather, sports, entertainment, finance and travel, in a fast paced, approachable style.

programme.title: The Killing of Ahmaud Arbery: Jogger Murder Trial
programme.desc: HLN covers the proceedings of Superior Court of Glynn County, Georgia, where Gregory McMichael, Travis McMichael and William 'Roddie' Bryan Jr, have been charged with chasing down and killing Ahmaud Arbery in February 2020.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A street fight takes the life of a wrestler. A jury believes the accused killed in cold blood. He gets sentenced to twenty years in prison. Six years later, he is granted another trial when a forensic animator offers a different explanation.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a 19-year-old girl is first found dead in her car, it seems to be an apparent suicide. Unsatisfied investigators probe the case further and discover the girl was involved in a complicated love quadrangle, giving several people a motive to kill her.

programme.title: Real Life Nightmare
programme.desc: A handsome, young medical student is out celebrating the start of Spring Break with friends after cramming for medical exams. Brian is clearly recorded on surveillance video entering a bar, but is mysteriously never seen leaving.

programme.title: Lies, Crimes and Video
programme.desc: A young Colorado mom disappears Thanksgiving Day, last seen on grocery store surveillance with her baby. Police soon uncover a brutal crime scene at her home and also expose a twisted love triangle.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a woman is shot to death in her driveway, police suspect a younger co-worker whose advances she spurned of killing her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is found sexually assaulted and stabbed to death on a beach, a mere 10 yards from her hotel. Police use the tennis shoes left at the scene of the crime to find her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A Colorado teen goes missing and the community bands together to find her. When her body is found nearly two years later, the investigation quickly switches from missing to murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators have few suspects when a young waitress is mysteriously murdered in her apartment. A call from a pawn shop miles away shifts the investigation southward.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After a young girl disappears from a small town in a remote area of Alaska, police wonder if she'd been attacked by a bear or become lost in the woods. After her body is discovered with two gunshot wounds they realize the truth is much darker.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Just before she's scheduled to testify against her alleged rapist, a woman is murdered on her front lawn. 15 years later, investigators used new technology to finally catch the woman's killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Forensic scientists study video surveillance of a trio of men who have been robbing banks for 7 years. They are eventually caught because of the forensic team's expert skill.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman becomes critically ill, leaving her unable to walk. As her symptoms worsen, she gets a bone marrow test. The results reveal arsenic. Investigators now have to determine if she was poisoned by water contamination, or something far more sinister.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young woman claims to need some time away on her own. After 20 years go by, her family begins to believe they will never know what happened to her, until one day they receive a phone call that will alter everything.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators believed they were looking for 2 murder weapons and 2 suspects, until further analysis of evidence set them down a different path, closer to home.

programme.title: Real Life Nightmare
programme.desc: A handsome, young medical student is out celebrating the start of Spring Break with friends after cramming for medical exams. Brian is clearly recorded on surveillance video entering a bar, but is mysteriously never seen leaving.

programme.title: Lies, Crimes and Video
programme.desc: A young Colorado mom disappears Thanksgiving Day, last seen on grocery store surveillance with her baby. Police soon uncover a brutal crime scene at her home and also expose a twisted love triangle.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Law enforcement officials turn to forensic scientists when they experience difficulty in their attempts to figure out how a stalker was able to steal his victim's personal photographs and obtain the code to her home security system.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An attractive university student was forcibly abducted from a mall parking lot and never seen alive again.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young doctor in a rural community is accused of sedating and sexually assaulting two of his female patients. DNA tests demonstrate that the doctor is innocent, but the women continue to insist that he sedated and raped them.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1993, two Texas teenagers, a 14-year-old boy and his 13-year-old stepsister, were brutally murdered. It took forensic evidence and a behavioral profile to identify their killer as Jason Massey, who had a history of torturing animals.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The 29-year-old, pregnant wife of a young, successful attorney is found dead in her Michigan home of a gunshot wound to the head. Blood spatter analysis and a painstaking investigation led police to the truth.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A mother and her daughter leave home for a day of shopping, but never return. The little girl's body was found dumped off of a roadside, but there was no sign of her mother. Forensic science determined if the baby's mother was a suspect or a victim.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a young man confessed to the rape and murder of a woman in a restaurant, police were convinced the case was solved. Eight years later, another man imprisoned for an unrelated crime, admitted he committed the murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A tiny clue enables police to determine where the victim had been just before she died; it would also lead them to her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Madalyn Murray O'Hair and her two top lieutenants disappeared with no shortage of suspects. Her abduction may never have been solved if it weren't for the discovery of a headless, handless body, and the serial number on an artificial hip.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Two eyewitnesses see a truck intentionally drive over a sleeping man outside a motorcycle gang's clubhouse. During the investigation the witnesses, the truck, and the body disappear, leaving police just one clue: a bloodstain in the snow.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police investigate when a severed leg is found in the garbage. When they realize they can't use conventional techniques to catch the killer, police must use scientific techniques like DNA testing and toxicology reports to find him.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In the summer of 1996, four women from South Bend, Indiana were sexually assaulted.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A union official is executed in his home after a strike by union membership, and no one in the neighborhood hears any gunshots.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Years after a man is hailed for shooting the man who allegedly criminally harassed him and murdered his wife after breaking into their home, new technologies force the police to reassess the case. A tragic tale soon becomes even more tragic in a new way.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a little girl got sick and died, investigators were stumped. Scientists would travel half-way around the world before finding the answer in two unlikely places.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A car is discovered in a drainage ditch with two bullet-riddled bodies inside, and a fingerprint from a latex glove provides key evidence investigators need to determine where the crime took place as well as the identity of the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police suspect a man in a hit and run, but he leased the car in question to someone in another state. Police found the vehicle and took it apart, uncovering evidence telling them just what happened.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The medical examiner ruled the death an accident, but the detectives investigating the case thought the evidence at the scene indicated otherwise. It would take three years, an exhumation and a second autopsy to determine who was right.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Three seemingly unrelated deaths proved to be serial murders. The killer had been careful; he used poison which has no taste or odor. Fortunately for investigators, it also had a unique chemical signature.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators find a shoe impression in the mud outside a victim's home that they hope will lead them to the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Phillip Rouss' health declined, and doctors couldn't pinpoint the source of his illness.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a six-year-old girl disappears without a trace, the parents become prime suspects.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police say that a car crash, which killed an elderly woman, was murder and arson. The driver, the victim’s daughter, insisted it was an accident.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A kidnapper torments an abducted girl's family with phone calls.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1962, the people of the small town of Hanford, California lost their sense of peace when one of their own, 15 year-old Marlene Miller, was murdered. It would take 24 years to bring her killer to justice.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young woman walked out of a department store, got into a rental car, and was never seen again. The signature on the rental car agreement turned out to be a forgery.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Exactly one year after beginning an affair with his friend's wife, a man vanishes. It's not until 15 years and a metal detector later that investigators will uncover the truth behind the disappearance.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons
programme.desc: Trapped in one of Africa's great deserts lies a lush hidden world, An untamed wilderness inlike any other on earth. Fed by a mighty river that travels from distant mountains, it is a vast mosaic of life, which pulsates with vivid beauty.

programme.desc: Despite its small size, Swaziland has a collection of wildlife that can rival all other safari trails of the nearby destinations. Not only does it boast 'Big 5' status, some 132 species of mammal have been recorded here.

programme.desc: In Zambia's Luangwa Valley, the once-mighty MK pride is in trouble. Dominant males, Axel and Mohawk, are hiding after the four Nomads, a gang of invading young males, attempted to take over the pride.

programme.desc: Milo is alone. While the pride was out hunting, his sibling was taken by a predator. With one cub and none of the females pregnant, the males leave to find new females.

programme.title: Super Senses
programme.desc: A vulture can spot a carcass from a great distance and a fish that is able to see both above and below the water at the same time. This episode features animals with an extreme sense of sight.

programme.title: Super Senses
programme.desc: Travel from the desert to the forest, Australia to Borneo and back, to learn about the auditory tricks different species possess. Whales use sonar to communicate under water, while a spider will listen to the wingbeats of its prey.

programme.title: Wild Tales From the Farm
programme.desc: The farm animals hunker down for the shortest days of the year. To stave off winter boredom, the cows enjoy holiday treats and a concert. Sheila the sow is busy with nine playful piglets, and Hamish the ram is spurred by flock darling, Bonnie.

programme.title: Animal Empires
programme.desc: Having a succession plan, making babies and raising them is crucial for species survival.

programme.title: Animal Empires
programme.desc: Over the course of recorded time, many species have been threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Animal Empires
programme.desc: As the popular characters of songs and stories, farm animals are celebrated all over the world. But few stories tell of their sister species who live in the wild. These animals known primarily as livestock or beasts of burden must fend for themselves.

programme.desc: Forty-one-year old Carol Krizan seems like the perfect match for Roy Joe McCaleb, then McCaleb is killed in his bed by an alleged prowler, but his family wonders if Krizan is responsible for his murder.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: After Julie Smith reports being sexually assaulted, Lt. Joe Kenda and his Sex Crimes Unit realize her assault resembles other attacks on the eastside of town; it's a race against time to catch a serial rapist before he strikes again.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Shot outside an auto parts store in broad daylight, Antoine McKenzie leaves behind a final message written in her own blood for Lt. Joe Kenda to puzzle over as his only lead.

programme.desc: A confrontation between enemies turns deadly, and Lt. Joe Kenda's best hope for answers lies with a grainy, dubbed-over surveillance tape; an elderly man fights for his life after a suspicious slip-and-fall.

programme.desc: As a newly promoted supervisor, Sgt. Joe Kenda gambles his career on a risky strategy to bring the killer of a popular disc jockey to justice.

programme.desc: The murder of a popular teenager at a crowded house party sends Lt. Joe Kenda down a winding road paved with lies, misdirection and innuendo; detectives use blood evidence to solve the shooting death of a firearms enthusiast.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: After grandparents are shot to death in their home, Lt. Joe Kenda's investigation kicks into high gear when his prime suspect flees for the Mexican border; police officers find a body so badly mutilated it turns the stomachs of seasoned officers.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A 72-year-old man is found stabbed to death in a junkyard, wearing nothing but his underwear and dentures; when investigators discover a trail of purchases made with the victim's credit card, they hope it will lead them to the killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A newborn girl is kidnapped, leaving her mother in anguish and police scrambling to find her; as days go by with no sign of the baby or demands for ransom, Sgts. Joe Kenda and Robert Sapp fear she's been sold on the black market or worse.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda

programme.desc: A young mother is viciously gunned down on Virginia's Chincoteague Island.

programme.title: American Detective With Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A slain woman's disabled child may hold the key to solving a double murder.

programme.title: American Detective With Lt. Joe Kenda

programme.title: American Detective With Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: An industrious teen learns there's a fine line between friends and killers.

programme.desc: A Texas mother's heartbreak at discovering her adult son's illicit affair leads to a mountain of resentment and, ultimately, a devastating confrontation (New!).

programme.desc: Ed Kemper appears to be a gentle giant who offers rides to young female hitchhikers, but behind his charming smile lurks a perverted monster; recorded audio confessions reveal the dark fantasies behind one of America's most notorious serial killers.

programme.title: The Co-Ed Killer: Mind of a Monster

programme.title: The Co-Ed Killer: Mind of a Monster
programme.desc: Fearing arrest, Kemper decides he must finally deal with his mother, bringing this story to a devastating finale; in custody, a psychiatrist gives Kemper a truth serum, which reveals his most horrifying secrets on tape.

programme.title: The Co-Ed Killer: Mind of a Monster
programme.desc: Ed Kemper appears to be a gentle giant who offers rides to young female hitchhikers, but behind his charming smile lurks a perverted monster; recorded audio confessions reveal the dark fantasies behind one of America's most notorious serial killers.

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Slow-witted Forrest Gump (Tom Hanks) has never thought of himself as disadvantaged, and thanks to his supportive mother (Sally Field), he leads anything but a restricted life. Whether dominating on the gridiron as a college football star, fighting in Vietnam or captaining a shrimp boat, Forrest inspires people with his childlike optimism. But one person Forrest cares about most may be the most difficult to save -- his childhood love, the sweet but troubled Jenny (Robin Wright).

programme.title: Fruitvale Station
programme.desc: Though he once spent time in San Quentin, 22-year-old black man Oscar Grant (Michael B. Jordan) is now trying hard to live a clean life and support his girlfriend (Melonie Diaz) and young daughter (Ariana Neal). Flashbacks reveal the last day in Oscar's life, in which he accompanied his family and friends to San Francisco to watch fireworks on New Year's Eve, and, on the way back home, became swept up in an altercation with police that ended in tragedy. Based on a true story.

programme.title: Minari
programme.desc: A Korean American family moves to an Arkansas farm in search of its own American dream. Amidst the challenges of this new life in the strange and rugged Ozarks, they discover the undeniable resilience of family and what really makes a home.

programme.title: Queenpins
programme.desc: A frustrated suburban housewife and her best friend hatch an illegal coupon-club scheme that scams millions from corporations and delivers deals to legions of fellow coupon clippers. Hot on their trail is an unlikely duo -- a hapless loss-prevention officer and a determined U.S. postal inspector -- both looking to end their criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Moonbase 8
programme.desc: Cap becomes an unwitting participant in Skip's psychological test and it leads to friction between the two of them; Rook proposes game night as a team bonding exercise.

programme.title: Moonbase 8
programme.desc: The team must decide between abandoning the mission or standing their ground when an angry group of ranchers threatens them for invading their land.

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: This Hollywood drama is based on the events of the Apollo 13 lunar mission, astronauts Jim Lovell (Tom Hanks), Fred Haise (Bill Paxton) and Jack Swigert (Kevin Bacon) find everything going according to plan after leaving Earth's orbit. However, when an oxygen tank explodes, the scheduled moon landing is called off. Subsequent tensions within the crew and numerous technical problems threaten both the astronauts' survival and their safe return to Earth.

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Slow-witted Forrest Gump (Tom Hanks) has never thought of himself as disadvantaged, and thanks to his supportive mother (Sally Field), he leads anything but a restricted life. Whether dominating on the gridiron as a college football star, fighting in Vietnam or captaining a shrimp boat, Forrest inspires people with his childlike optimism. But one person Forrest cares about most may be the most difficult to save -- his childhood love, the sweet but troubled Jenny (Robin Wright).

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City
programme.desc: In this quartet of neo-noir tales, a mysterious salesman (Josh Hartnett) narrates a tragic story of co-dependency, while a musclebound vigilante (Mickey Rourke) tears his way through the criminal underworld in search of his lost love (Jaime King). In another part of the city, a grizzled cop (Bruce Willis) foils the ambitions of a child-killer (Nick Stahl), and an ex-prostitute (Brittany Murphy) evades her ex-pimp (Benicio Del Toro) with the help of her new boyfriend, Dwight (Clive Owen).

programme.title: American Psycho
programme.desc: In New York City in 1987, a handsome, young urban professional, Patrick Bateman (Christian Bale), lives a second life as a gruesome serial killer by night. The cast is filled by the detective (Willem Dafoe), the fiance (Reese Witherspoon), the mistress (Samantha Mathis), the coworker (Jared Leto), and the secretary (Chloë Sevigny). This is a biting, wry comedy examining the elements that make a man a monster.

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: Policewoman Amelia Donaghy (Angelina Jolie) is in hot pursuit of a serial murderer whose calling card is a small shard of bone extracted from each of his victims. Unable to decipher the cryptic clues the killer leaves behind at the scene of the crime, Amelia calls upon quadriplegic forensic criminology expert Lincoln Rhyme (Denzel Washington) to help. With Amelia acting as Rhyme's able-bodied go-between, the pair piece together disparate clues, hoping they will learn who the next victim is.

programme.title: Senior Moment
programme.desc: After drag racing his vintage convertible around Palm Springs, Calif., a retired NASA test pilot loses his license. Forced to take public transportation, he meets Caroline and learns to navigate love and life again.

programme.title: The Show
programme.desc: A glimpse into the months of work that went into the creation of The Weeknd's halftime show for Super Bowl LV.

programme.title: The Guard
programme.desc: A vulgar Irish cop (Brendan Gleeson) and a straight-laced American FBI agent (Don Cheadle) uncover police corruption among the former's superiors while probing a drug-trafficking ring.

programme.title: Ex Machina
programme.desc: Caleb Smith (Domhnall Gleeson) a programmer at a huge Internet company, wins a contest that enables him to spend a week at the private estate of Nathan Bateman (Oscar Isaac), his firm's brilliant CEO. When he arrives, Caleb learns that he has been chosen to be the human component in a Turing test to determine the capabilities and consciousness of Ava (Alicia Vikander), a beautiful robot. However, it soon becomes evident that Ava is far more self-aware and deceptive than either man imagined.

programme.title: Nightcrawler
programme.desc: Los Angeles denizen Louis Bloom (Jake Gyllenhaal) survives by scavenging and petty theft. He stumbles into a new career as a cameraman and -- armed with a camcorder and police scanner -- begins nocturnal forays across the city in search of shocking and grisly crimes. When he catches the eye of a shopworn news director (Rene Russo) who welcomes the chance to raise her station's ratings, Louis goes to increasingly greater lengths to catch the "money shot.".

programme.title: JFK Revisited: Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Filmmaker Oliver Stone examines the circumstances surrounding the assassination of President John F. Kennedy on Nov. 22, 1963, in Dallas.

programme.title: Kevin Garnett: Anything Is Possible
programme.desc: Chronicling the career of one of the NBA's all-time greats, featuring scenes from Garnett's induction into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame (New!).

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Raff is horrified to realize that, due to severe memory loss, Genevieve no longer remembers their wedding day; Colette confronts Linda about her bullying and discovers the shocking truth about her boss; Nik learns his job application was successful.

programme.title: Dexter: New Blood
programme.desc: The investigation that Dexter has caused is making it difficult for him to make things right with Harrison, who has made a name for himself at school as a member of the wrestling team.

programme.title: Yellowjackets
programme.desc: The teens get their bearings as Misty finds hell on earth quite becoming; in the present: revenge, sex homework and the policeman formerly known as Goth.

programme.title: Senior Moment
programme.desc: After drag racing his vintage convertible around Palm Springs, Calif., a retired NASA test pilot loses his license. Forced to take public transportation, he meets Caroline and learns to navigate love and life again.

programme.title: Boogie Nights
programme.desc: In the San Fernando Valley in 1977, teenage busboy Eddie Adams (Mark Wahlberg) gets discovered by porn director Jack Horner (Burt Reynolds), who transforms him into adult-film sensation Dirk Diggler. Brought into a supportive circle of friends, including fellow actors Amber Waves (Julianne Moore), Rollergirl (Heather Graham) and Reed Rothchild (John C. Reilly), Dirk fulfills all his ambitions, but a toxic combination of drugs and egotism threatens to take him back down.

programme.title: Gloria Bell
programme.desc: A free-spirited divorcee spends her nights on the dance floor, joyfully letting loose at clubs around Los Angeles. She soon finds herself thrust into an unexpected new romance, filled with the joys of budding love and the complications of dating.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: As bass guitarist for a garage-rock band, Scott Pilgrim (Michael Cera) has never had trouble getting a girlfriend; usually, the problem is getting rid of them. But when Ramona Flowers (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) skates into his heart, he finds she has the most troublesome baggage of all: an army of ex-boyfriends who will stop at nothing to eliminate him from her list of suitors.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Donna (Meryl Streep), an independent hotelier in the Greek islands, is preparing for her daughter's wedding with the help of two old friends. Meanwhile Sophie, the spirited bride, has a plan. She secretly invites three men from her mother's past in hope of meeting her real father and having him escort her down the aisle on her big day.

programme.title: Before Sunset
programme.desc: A sequel to "Before Sunrise," this film starts nine years later as Jesse (Ethan Hawke) travels across Europe giving readings from a book he wrote about the night he spent in Vienna with Celine (Julie Delpy). After his reading in Paris, Celine finds him, and they spend part of the day together before Jesse has to again leave for a flight. They are both in relationships now, and Jesse has a son, but as their strong feelings for each other start to return, both confess a longing for more.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: When decorated military officer Chris Vaughn (The Rock) returns to his hometown in the state of Washington to find work, he finds that the lumber mill has closed, and the town's big business is now a seedy casino operated by one of his old schoolmates, Jay Hamilton (Neal McDonough). Aided by his loyal friend Ray Templeton (Johnny Knoxville), Vaughn tries to make a stand against the area's crime and corruption, but, finding no help from the police, he must take matters into his own hands.

programme.title: Dances With Wolves
programme.desc: A Civil War soldier develops a relationship with a band of Lakota Indians. Attracted by the simplicity of their lifestyle, he chooses to leave his former life behind to be with them. Having observed him, they give the name Dances With Wolves. Soon he is a welcomed member of the tribe and falls in love with a white woman who has been raised in the tribe. Tragedy results when Union soldiers arrive with designs on the land.

programme.title: The Gentlemen
programme.desc: Mickey Pearson is an American expatriate who became rich by building a highly profitable marijuana empire in London. When word gets out that he's looking to cash out of the business, it soon triggers an array of plots and schemes -- including bribery and blackmail -- from shady characters who want to steal his domain.

programme.title: VICE
programme.sub-title: Land of the Free & Ethiopia's War Within
programme.desc: Vegas Tenold travels to a conservative enclave in northern Idaho that has burgeoned in the wake of the 2020 election; Julia Steers reports on Ethiopia's ongoing civil war, where Prime Minister Ahmed Abiy has been accused of ethnic cleansing (New!).

programme.title: Under the Tuscan Sun
programme.desc: When Frances Mayes (Diane Lane) learns her husband is cheating on her from a writer whom she gave a bad review, her life is turned upside down. In an attempt to bring her out of a deep depression, her best friend, Patti (Sandra Oh), encourages Frances to take a tour of Italy. During the trip, the new divorcée impulsively decides to purchase a rural Tuscan villa and struggles to start her life anew amid colorful local characters, including the handsome Marcello (Raoul Bova).

programme.title: The Humans
programme.desc: Erik Blake gathers three generations of his Pennsylvania family to celebrate Thanksgiving at his daughter's apartment in lower Manhattan. As darkness falls and eerie things go bump in the night, the group's deepest fears are laid bare.

programme.title: When Harry Met Sally...
programme.desc: In 1977, college graduates Harry Burns (Billy Crystal) and Sally Albright (Meg Ryan) share a contentious car ride from Chicago to New York, during which they argue about whether men and women can ever truly be strictly platonic friends. Ten years later, Harry and Sally meet again at a bookstore, and in the company of their respective best friends, Jess (Bruno Kirby) and Marie (Carrie Fisher), attempt to stay friends without sex becoming an issue between them.

programme.title: Even More Funny Women of a Certain Age
programme.desc: Golden Globe winner Teri Hatcher joins the stage with some of the funniest women in comedy for one night of over-the-top, uninhibited standup (New!).

programme.title: In Like Flint
programme.desc: Former Z.O.W.I.E. spy Derek Flint (James Coburn) is called back from retirement after his former spy chief, Lloyd C. Cramden (Lee J. Cobb), is framed for prurient behavior with a prostitute, and U.S. President Trent (Andrew Duggan) experiences an incident of "lost time." After Flint discovers irregularities on a recently launched space-station mission, he realizes that an international conspiracy is afoot. He travels the world and assumes myriad disguises to unravel the nefarious plot.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: Genetically engineered from conception to be the perfect killing machine, he's the culmination of decades of research, endowed with unprecedented strength, speed, stamina and intelligence. Known only as Agent 47 (Rupert Friend), his latest target is a corporation that plans to unlock the secret of his past to create an army of killers even more powerful than him. With help from a young woman, the elite assassin confronts revelations about his own origins in an epic battle with his deadliest foe.

programme.title: Upgrade
programme.desc: A brutal mugging leaves Grey Trace paralyzed in the hospital and his beloved wife dead. A billionaire inventor soon offers Trace a cure -- an artificial intelligence implant called STEM that will enhance his body. Now able to walk, Grey finds that he also has superhuman strength and agility -- skills he uses to seek revenge against the thugs who destroyed his life.

programme.title: Glass
programme.desc: David Dunn tries to stay one step ahead of the law while delivering vigilante justice on the streets of Philadelphia. His special talents soon put him on a collision course with the Beast -- the psychotic madman who has superhuman strength and 23 distinct personalities. Their epic showdown leads them to an encounter with the mysterious Elijah Price, the criminal mastermind who holds critical secrets for both men.

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: When astronauts blast off from the planet Mars, they leave behind Mark Watney (Matt Damon), presumed dead after a fierce storm. With only a meager amount of supplies, the stranded visitor must utilize his wits and spirit to find a way to survive on the hostile planet. Meanwhile, back on Earth, members of NASA and a team of international scientists work tirelessly to bring him home, while his crew mates hatch their own plan for a daring rescue mission.

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: When astronauts blast off from the planet Mars, they leave behind Mark Watney (Matt Damon), presumed dead after a fierce storm. With only a meager amount of supplies, the stranded visitor must utilize his wits and spirit to find a way to survive on the hostile planet. Meanwhile, back on Earth, members of NASA and a team of international scientists work tirelessly to bring him home, while his crew mates hatch their own plan for a daring rescue mission.

programme.title: Where's the Money
programme.desc: A young man from South Central Los Angeles must pledge a fraternity to recover a stash of stolen money.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: Genetically engineered from conception to be the perfect killing machine, he's the culmination of decades of research, endowed with unprecedented strength, speed, stamina and intelligence. Known only as Agent 47 (Rupert Friend), his latest target is a corporation that plans to unlock the secret of his past to create an army of killers even more powerful than him. With help from a young woman, the elite assassin confronts revelations about his own origins in an epic battle with his deadliest foe.

programme.title: The Horror of It All
programme.desc: Yankee salesman Jack (Pat Boone) wants to marry Cynthia Marley (Erica Rogers), and they travel to her family's English estate to break the good news. Cynthia warns that the family is a bit odd, which proves to be an understatement. One relative is an ex-thespian who still believes he's in a play, another behaves like a vampire and a third is imprisoned in the cellar due to his violent tendencies. But things get really sinister when the Marleys start succumbing to violent fates, one by one.

programme.title: In Like Flint
programme.desc: Former Z.O.W.I.E. spy Derek Flint (James Coburn) is called back from retirement after his former spy chief, Lloyd C. Cramden (Lee J. Cobb), is framed for prurient behavior with a prostitute, and U.S. President Trent (Andrew Duggan) experiences an incident of "lost time." After Flint discovers irregularities on a recently launched space-station mission, he realizes that an international conspiracy is afoot. He travels the world and assumes myriad disguises to unravel the nefarious plot.

programme.title: Von Ryan's Express
programme.desc: World War II story about Allied prisoners who stage a mass breakout from an Italian POW camp, commandeer a train and head towards the Swiss border. As the Italian war effort collapses, the escapees are aided by their captors, but when the Germans catch on, they set out to halt the escape with an armored train and aerial attack.

programme.title: The French Connection
programme.desc: New York Detective "Popeye" Doyle (Gene Hackman) and his partner (Roy Scheider) chase a French heroin smuggler.

programme.title: My Cousin Rachel
programme.desc: When Philip Ashley's (Richard Burton) wealthy cousin, Ambrose (John Sutton), dies suddenly, his suspicions drift to Ambrose's new and icy wife, Rachel (Olivia de Havilland), who stands to benefit greatly from his cousin's death. When Ashley is introduced to Rachel at Ambrose's funeral, however, his fears are immediately laid to rest: how could such a beautiful young woman possibly be a murderer? But when the estate is left to Ashley, he begins to fear for his life.

programme.title: The Three Faces of Eve
programme.desc: Suffering from headaches and inexplicable blackouts, timid housewife Eve White (Joanne Woodward) begins seeing a psychiatrist, Dr. Luther (Lee J. Cobb). He's stunned when she transforms before his eyes into the lascivious Eve Black, and diagnoses her as having multiple personalities. It's not long before a third, calling herself Jane, also appears. Through hypnosis and continued therapy, Luther struggles to help Eve recall the trauma that caused her identity to fracture.

programme.title: Glass
programme.desc: David Dunn tries to stay one step ahead of the law while delivering vigilante justice on the streets of Philadelphia. His special talents soon put him on a collision course with the Beast -- the psychotic madman who has superhuman strength and 23 distinct personalities. Their epic showdown leads them to an encounter with the mysterious Elijah Price, the criminal mastermind who holds critical secrets for both men.

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Amy (Mila Kunis) has a great husband, overachieving children, beautiful home and successful career. Unfortunately, she's also overworked, exhausted and ready to snap. Fed up, she joins forces with two other stressed-out mothers (Kristen Bell, Kathryn Hahn) to get away from daily life and conventional responsibilities. As the gals go wild with their newfound freedom, they set themselves up for the ultimate showdown with PTA queen bee Gwendolyn and her clique of seemingly perfect moms.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: When Pete and Ellie decide to start a family, they stumble into the world of foster care adoption. They hope to take in one small child, but when they meet three siblings, including a rebellious 15-year-old girl, they find themselves speeding from zero to three kids overnight. Now, Pete and Ellie must try to learn the ropes of instant parenthood in the hope of becoming a family.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: When Pete and Ellie decide to start a family, they stumble into the world of foster care adoption. They hope to take in one small child, but when they meet three siblings, including a rebellious 15-year-old girl, they find themselves speeding from zero to three kids overnight. Now, Pete and Ellie must try to learn the ropes of instant parenthood in the hope of becoming a family.

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Amy (Mila Kunis) has a great husband, overachieving children, beautiful home and successful career. Unfortunately, she's also overworked, exhausted and ready to snap. Fed up, she joins forces with two other stressed-out mothers (Kristen Bell, Kathryn Hahn) to get away from daily life and conventional responsibilities. As the gals go wild with their newfound freedom, they set themselves up for the ultimate showdown with PTA queen bee Gwendolyn and her clique of seemingly perfect moms.

programme.title: Snatched
programme.desc: Dumped by her boyfriend on the eve of their vacation, impetuous dreamer Emily Middleton persuades her cautious mother, Linda, to accompany her on an exotic getaway to South America. Polar opposites, Emily and Linda must soon work through their differences to escape from a wildly outrageous and dangerous jungle adventure.

programme.title: The French Connection
programme.desc: New York Detective "Popeye" Doyle (Gene Hackman) and his partner (Roy Scheider) chase a French heroin smuggler.

programme.title: The Three Faces of Eve
programme.desc: Suffering from headaches and inexplicable blackouts, timid housewife Eve White (Joanne Woodward) begins seeing a psychiatrist, Dr. Luther (Lee J. Cobb). He's stunned when she transforms before his eyes into the lascivious Eve Black, and diagnoses her as having multiple personalities. It's not long before a third, calling herself Jane, also appears. Through hypnosis and continued therapy, Luther struggles to help Eve recall the trauma that caused her identity to fracture.

programme.title: The Robe
programme.desc: In this biblical epic, a drunk and disillusioned Roman, Marcellus Gallio (Richard Burton), wins Jesus' robe in a dice game after the crucifixion. Marcellus has never been a man of faith like his slave, Demetrius (Victor Mature), but when Demetrius escapes with the robe, Marcellus experiences disturbing visions and feels guilty for his actions. Convinced that destroying the robe will cure him, Marcellus sets out to find Demetrius -- and discovers his Christian faith along the way.

programme.title: Demetrius and the Gladiators
programme.desc: In this sequel to "The Robe," the corrupt emperor Caligula (Jay Robinson) believes that the sacred robe of Christ has magical powers, and will stop at nothing to obtain it. When Demetrius (Victor Mature) refuses to help Caligula find the holy object, Caligula has him arrested and forces him to fight in the arena in battles to the death. As Demetrius faces trial after trial, his faith in Christ is pushed to its limits, as he sees no point in the endless suffering he is forced to endure.

programme.title: State Fair
programme.desc: The small-town Frake family attend the Iowa State Fair, the annual highlight of their summer. Son Wayne (Dick Haymes) plots revenge on a midway barker (Henry Morgan) who had embarrassed him the summer before and falls for the beautiful singer Emily (Vivian Blaine), while his melancholy sister Margie (Jeanne Crain) becomes smitten with slick city-boy reporter Pat (Dana Andrews). Meanwhile, mother Melissa (Fay Bainter) and father Abel (Charles Winninger) plot to win their respective competitions.

programme.title: The Book of Life
programme.desc: In the Mexican town of San Angel, Manolo (Diego Luna), Maria (Zoë Saldana) and Joaquin (Channing Tatum) have been friends ever since childhood. Although their lives have taken different paths -- Maria was sent to Europe, Joaquin joined the military, and Manolo studied to become a bullfighter -- one thing remains the same: Manolo and Joaquin both want to marry Maria. Little does the trio know that battling husband-and-wife deities have made a high-stakes wager on the love triangle's outcome.

programme.title: The Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: Life always seems complicated for good ol' Charlie Brown (Noah Schnapp), the boy who always tries his best against seemingly impossible odds. When the Little Red-Haired Girl moves into his neighborhood, Charlie Brown develops a crush on her. Meanwhile, his best friend Snoopy embarks on an epic adventure in a fantasy world. As a World War I flying ace, the lovable beagle pursues his nemesis, the Red Baron, while also trying to win the heart of a beautiful poodle named Fifi (Kristin Chenoweth).

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets
programme.desc: Max (Louis C.K.) is a spoiled terrier who enjoys a comfortable life in a New York building until his owner adopts Duke, a giant and unruly canine. During their walk outside, they encounter a group of ferocious alley cats and wind up in a truck that's bound for the pound. Luckily, a rebellious bunny named Snowball swoops in to save the doggy duo from captivity. In exchange, Snowball demands that Max and Duke join his gang of abandoned pets on a mission against the humans who've done them wrong.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets 2
programme.desc: Explore the emotional lives of pets and the deep bond between them and the families that love them as Max, Gidget, Snowball and the rest of the gang take on new adventures and push themselves to find the courage to become their own heroes.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets
programme.desc: Max (Louis C.K.) is a spoiled terrier who enjoys a comfortable life in a New York building until his owner adopts Duke, a giant and unruly canine. During their walk outside, they encounter a group of ferocious alley cats and wind up in a truck that's bound for the pound. Luckily, a rebellious bunny named Snowball swoops in to save the doggy duo from captivity. In exchange, Snowball demands that Max and Duke join his gang of abandoned pets on a mission against the humans who've done them wrong.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets 2
programme.desc: Explore the emotional lives of pets and the deep bond between them and the families that love them as Max, Gidget, Snowball and the rest of the gang take on new adventures and push themselves to find the courage to become their own heroes.

programme.title: Snatched
programme.desc: Dumped by her boyfriend on the eve of their vacation, impetuous dreamer Emily Middleton persuades her cautious mother, Linda, to accompany her on an exotic getaway to South America. Polar opposites, Emily and Linda must soon work through their differences to escape from a wildly outrageous and dangerous jungle adventure.

programme.title: RV
programme.desc: The Munros are a typically American dysfunctional family, complete with rebellious, uncommunicative offspring and baffled parents. Patriarch Bob (Robin Williams) would like to remedy the situation before his son and daughter instant-message their parents out of their lives. Bob rents a motor home to take the clan on vacation but soon finds that camping and togetherness can be hazardous to one's health.

programme.title: The Wife
programme.desc: Joan and Joe remain complements after nearly 40 years of marriage. Where Joe is casual, Joan is elegant. Where Joe is vain, Joan is self-effacing. And where Joe enjoys his very public role as the great American novelist, Joan pours her considerable intellect, grace, charm and diplomacy into the private role of a great man's wife. As Joe is about to be awarded the Nobel Prize for his acclaimed and prolific body of work, Joan starts to think about the shared compromises, secrets and betrayals.

programme.title: Something's Gotta Give
programme.desc: When aging womanizer Harry Sanborn (Jack Nicholson) and his young girlfriend, Marin (Amanda Peet), arrive at her family's beach house in the Hamptons, they find that her mother, dramatist Erica Barry (Diane Keaton), also plans to stay for the weekend. Erica is scandalized by the relationship and Harry's sexist ways. But when Harry has a heart attack, and a doctor (Keanu Reeves) prescribes bed rest at the Barry home, he finds himself falling for Erica -- who, for once, may be out of his league.

programme.title: Power Book II: Ghost
programme.desc: Tariq tries to resume his normal college life; Brayden provides Tariq an escape; Monet makes plans for the business to protect her children; Cane seeks out a new family to take the streets for himself.

programme.title: A Crime on the Bayou
programme.desc: Washington, D.C. attorney Richard Sobol stands up to a racist legal system to defend Gary Duncan, a Black teenager wrongfully accused of assaulting a boy in 1966 New Orleans.

programme.title: Long Weekend
programme.desc: An enchanted weekend courtship leads to unexpected revelations between a young man and woman who harbor deep secrets.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: In an effort to expand into new territory, Meech discovers a disturbing alliance then hatches a plan to eliminate the threat; Terry is forced to make a life-altering decision.

programme.title: RV
programme.desc: The Munros are a typically American dysfunctional family, complete with rebellious, uncommunicative offspring and baffled parents. Patriarch Bob (Robin Williams) would like to remedy the situation before his son and daughter instant-message their parents out of their lives. But when Harry has a heart attack, and a doctor (Keanu Reeves) prescribes bed rest at the Barry home, he finds himself falling for Erica -- who, for once, may be out of his league.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: In an effort to expand into new territory, Meech discovers a disturbing alliance then hatches a plan to eliminate the threat; Terry is forced to make a life-altering decision.

programme.title: Saw III
programme.desc: Dr. Lynn Denlon (Bahar Soomekh) becomes a pawn in the Jigsaw Killer's (Tobin Bell) latest gory game. Kidnapped and taken to an abandoned warehouse, she finds Jigsaw bedridden and dying. Her task is to keep the maniac alive long enough for Jeff (Angus Macfadyen), a fellow victim, to complete his own task. Each is unaware that Jigsaw has much bigger -- and deadlier -- plans in store.

programme.title: Power Book II: Ghost
programme.desc: Tariq tries to resume his normal college life; Brayden provides Tariq an escape; Monet makes plans for the business to protect her children; Cane seeks out a new family to take the streets for himself.

programme.title: The Wife
programme.desc: Joan and Joe remain complements after nearly 40 years of marriage. Where Joe is casual, Joan is elegant. Where Joe is vain, Joan is self-effacing. And where Joe enjoys his very public role as the great American novelist, Joan pours her considerable intellect, grace, charm and diplomacy into the private role of a great man's wife. As Joe is about to be awarded the Nobel Prize for his acclaimed and prolific body of work, Joan starts to think about the shared compromises, secrets and betrayals.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity
programme.desc: Soon after moving into a suburban tract home, Katie (Katie Featherston) and Micah (Micah Sloat) become increasingly disturbed by what appears to be a supernatural presence. Hoping to capture evidence of it on film, they set up video cameras in the house but are not prepared for the terrifying events that follow.

programme.title: Bloodshot
programme.desc: Recently killed in action, soldier Ray Garrison gets a new lease on life when the RST Corp. brings him back from the dead. With an army of nanotechnology in his veins, he's an unstoppable force -- stronger than ever with the power to heal instantly. But when the company decides to manipulate his mind and memories, Garrison must embark on a desperate mission to find out what's real and what's not.

programme.title: Mortdecai
programme.desc: Charismatic British aristocrat and part-time shady art dealer Charlie Mortdecai (Johnny Depp) suffers from a constant lack of funds to support his lush lifestyle, so when Alistair Maitland (Ewan McGregor), a college friend and officer in MI5, asks him to find a stolen Goya painting, he accepts. But Charlie's not the only one with designs on the painting; an American heiress and a revolutionary want it too, for the artwork is rumored to contain the code to a bank account filled with Nazi gold.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger
programme.desc: In 1933 a boy discovers an ancient Native American in a sideshow carnival tent. The Indian is Tonto (Johnny Depp), the old companion of John Reid (Armie Hammer), a lawman more famously known as the Lone Ranger. With this opportunity to set the record straight about his and Reid's adventures, Tonto recalls the day in 1869 when he first encountered the man who would be his trusted friend and tells of their teamwork bringing down Butch Cavendish (William Fichtner) and other Old West outlaws.

programme.title: The Craft: Legacy
programme.desc: An eclectic foursome of aspiring teenage witches get more than they bargained for as they lean into their newfound powers.

programme.title: Power Book II: Ghost
programme.desc: Tariq tries to resume his normal college life; Brayden provides Tariq an escape; Monet makes plans for the business to protect her children; Cane seeks out a new family to take the streets for himself.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: In an effort to expand into new territory, Meech discovers a disturbing alliance then hatches a plan to eliminate the threat; Terry is forced to make a life-altering decision.
