programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A chronicle of the 1970 college football match-up between USC and the Crimson Tide examines the surprising decision made by legendary coach Paul Bear Bryant and its lasting impact on the struggle for integration.

programme.title: A Most Violent Year
programme.desc: In 1981 New York, a fuel supplier (Oscar Isaac) tries to adhere to his own moral compass amid the rampant violence, corruption and decay that threaten his family and his business.

programme.title: Déjà Vu
programme.desc: The team of top-secret program brings ATF agent Doug Carlin (Denzel Washington) into its midst to capture the terrorist (Jim Caviezel) responsible for a ferry bombing that left hundreds dead. Its amazing technology lets the team fold time four days backward and see the madman's movements as he plots to kill a woman who could give him away. Doug realizes that the technology could allow him to do what law-enforcement officers dream of -- go back in time to prevent the crime.

programme.title: Alex Cross
programme.desc: Alex Cross (Tyler Perry) works as a detective/psychologist for the Detroit Police Department along with his lifelong friend, Tommy Kane (Edward Burns), and detective Monica Ashe (Rachel Nichols). Cross' latest case puts him on a collision course with Picasso (Matthew Fox), a cunning serial killer whose ultimate target is multinational industrialist Giles Mercier (Jean Reno). Cross must find a way inside Picasso's head not only to catch the killer but also to stem the violent urges Cross feels.

programme.title: Demolition Man
programme.desc: With innocent victims caught in the crossfire in Los Angeles' intensifying war on crime, both cop John Spartan (Sylvester Stallone) and violent thug Simon Phoenix (Wesley Snipes) are sentenced to a state of frozen incarceration known as "CryoPrison." When Spartan is finally thawed 36 years later, it's 2032, and Los Angeles is now a pacifist utopia called San Angeles. But with Phoenix again on the loose, Spartan must team up with future cop Lenina (Sandra Bullock) to apprehend the killer.

programme.title: Sleeper Cell
programme.desc: The cell buys explosives from a white supremacist militia, while Darwyn's new handler, Patrice Serxner, tries to prevent the LAPD from blowing his cover in another investigation.

programme.title: Under the Volcano
programme.desc: Producer George Martin opens AIR Studios Montserrat, a state-of-the-art recording facility on an exotic Caribbean island. In the shadow of an active volcano, the studio attracts some of the biggest musical acts on the planet.

programme.title: Michael Jackson's This Is It
programme.desc: Prior to his untimely death, Jackson was in the midst of preparing for a series of sold-out concerts that were scheduled to take place in London during the summer of 2009. Behind-the-scenes footage, filmed between March and June of 2009, captures the pop superstar in intimate detail as he developed and rehearsed for the "This Is It" tour.

programme.title: VICE
programme.sub-title: Land of the Free & Ethiopia's War Within
programme.desc: Vegas Tenold travels to a conservative enclave in northern Idaho that has burgeoned in the wake of the 2020 election; Julia Steers reports on Ethiopia's ongoing civil war, where Prime Minister Ahmed Abiy has been accused of ethnic cleansing (New!).

programme.title: Finding Forrester
programme.desc: A unique relationship develops between an eccentric, reclusive novelist and a young, amazingly gifted scholar-athlete. After the novelist discovers that the young athlete is also an excellent writer and secretly takes him on as his protégé, they develop an unlikely friendship. As they learn more about each other, they learn more about themselves, and ultimately, with the help of his new mentor, the basketball star must choose the right path.

programme.title: Desus & Mero
programme.desc: Comic-actor Kevin Hart.

programme.title: The Watermelon Woman
programme.desc: An aspiring black lesbian filmmaker (Cheryl Dunye) researches an obscure 1940s black actress billed as the Watermelon Woman.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: The life and accomplishments of Ulric Cross.

programme.title: Quiet Storm: The Ron Artest Story
programme.desc: NBA player Ron Artest, also known as Metta World Peace, becomes an outspoken advocate for the importance of mental health among athletes.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Filmmaker Terri Flores (Jennifer Lopez) is traveling deep in the Amazon jungle looking for a forgotten tribe. Terri and her crew, which includes an anthropologist (Eric Stoltz) and a cameraman (Ice Cube), come across Paul (Jon Voight), who is stranded on the riverbank. He offers to help them find the tribe, but his secretive behavior puts everyone on edge. They realize too late that he's using them to find a legendary anaconda that's worth a fortune -- if they can catch it.

programme.title: Madonna & Basquiat
programme.desc: 1980s New York artist Jean Michel Basquiat spends a night out with his not-yet discovered girlfriend Madonna, before a pivotal moment in both their lives.

programme.title: Dance Flick
programme.desc: Megan White (Shoshana Bush), a naive teen, and Thomas Uncles (Damon Wayans Jr.), a student from the wrong side of the tracks, find common ground in their love of dancing. Megan and Thomas join forces to perfect their moves and win the mother of all dance battles, though they face stiff competition Nora, the school's queen of the dance floor.

programme.title: The Honeymooners
programme.desc: Ralph Kramden (Cedric the Entertainer) drives a bus in New York City but dreams of something more. Unfortunately, none of Ralph's business ideas -- which often incorporate his best friend, Ed (Mike Epps) -- have panned out. Knowing their husbands will never get them out of the city, Ralph's wife, Alice (Gabrielle Union), and Ed's wife, Trixie (Regina Hall), pool their savings to purchase a house in the suburbs. But once the men find out about the secret stash, they might just blow it all.

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back in Business
programme.desc: This sequel to the 2002 film returns to the Chicago barbershop owned by Calvin Palmer Jr. (Ice Cube). His employees -- Isaac (Troy Garity), Terri (Eve), Ricky (Michael Ealy), Dinka (Leonard Earl Howze) and Kenard -- have their own personal and workplace problems, and a new barbershop called Nappy Cutz has moved in across the street. As Calvin tries to change the character of his business, Nappy Cutz and gentrification become a threat to the surrounding community.

programme.title: Last Holiday
programme.desc: The discovery that she has a terminal illness prompts introverted saleswoman Georgia Byrd (Queen Latifah) to reflect on what she realizes has been an overly cautious life. So Georgia withdraws her life savings and jets off to Europe where she lives like a millionaire. Upbeat and passionate, Georgia charms everybody she meets, including renowned Chef Didier (Gérard Depardieu). The only one missing from her new life is her longtime crush Sean Matthews (LL Cool J).

programme.title: Head of State
programme.desc: A low-level Washington, D.C., public servant, Mays Gilliam (Chris Rock), is thrust into the national spotlight when he's asked by Martin Geller (Dylan Baker), the head of the Democratic Party, to run for president after the party's presidential and vice-presidential nominees are killed in a plane crash. The odds are against Gilliam, mostly because he has a penchant for telling the truth about what is wrong with the country. Remarkably, his straight-talking style catches on with the public.

programme.title: The Best of All the Smoke With Matt Barnes and Stephen Jackson
programme.desc: NBA Champion Steph Curry discusses the Warriors dynasty, Kevin Durant's impact on the court, and reflects on changing the game of basketball.

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Marty and "The Rainmaker" work to stop the acquisition; Roscoe gives Marty attitude.

Hot on their trail is an unlikely duo -- a hapless loss-prevention officer and a determined U.S. postal inspector -- both looking to end their criminal enterprise.

Terri and her crew, which includes an anthropologist (Eric Stoltz) and a cameraman (Ice Cube), come across Paul (Jon Voight), who is stranded on the riverbank. He offers to help them find the tribe, but his secretive behavior puts everyone on edge. They realize too late that he's using them to find a legendary anaconda that's worth a fortune -- if they can catch it.

programme.title: Dance Flick
programme.desc: Megan White (Shoshana Bush), a naive teen, and Thomas Uncles (Damon Wayans Jr.), a student from the wrong side of the tracks, find common ground in their love of dancing. Megan and Thomas join forces to perfect their moves and win the mother of all dance battles, though they face stiff competition Nora, the school's queen of the dance floor.

programme.title: The Long Shadow
programme.desc: A Louisiana deputy uncovers hometown corruption after the mysterious death of her lover.

programme.title: Aquarium of the Dead
programme.desc: Sea creatures in an aquarium become zombies after a scientific accident.

programme.title: Fast and Fierce: Death Race
programme.desc: Jack is on his way to grabbing the cash prize for an illegal car race in Mexico to California, when a desperate woman, fleeing from her gangster boyfriend who runs the tournament, jumps into his car pleading for help.

programme.title: Alex Cross
programme.desc: Alex Cross (Tyler Perry) works as a detective/psychologist for the Detroit Police Department along with his lifelong friend, Tommy Kane (Edward Burns), and detective Monica Ashe (Rachel Nichols). Cross' latest case puts him on a collision course with Picasso (Matthew Fox), a cunning serial killer whose ultimate target is multinational industrialist Giles Mercier (Jean Reno). Cross must find a way inside Picasso's head not only to catch the killer but also to stem the violent urges Cross feels.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?
programme.desc: Attempting to win the favor of the newly divorced Suzanne (Nia Long), Nick (Ice Cube) offers to accompany her children, Lindsey (Aleisha Allen) and Kevin (Philip Bolden), on a flight from Portland, Ore., to Canada to see their mother. A mishap with a corkscrew and a metal detector gets the troupe banned from the flight, however, so Nick is forced to drive the kids in his prized Lincoln Navigator. Tensions inevitably rise during the long road trip, but Nick is not to be deterred.

programme.title: Scary Movie V
programme.desc: Much bizarre activity follows after a husband (Simon Rex) and wife (Ashley Tisdale) bring their newborn infant home from the hospital. When they realize that a demon is stalking their family, they consult paranormal specialists and install numerous cameras to drive out the pesky spirit. Movies that are spoofed in the familiar format include the "Paranormal Activity" franchise, "Mama," "Sinister," "Evil Dead," "Inception," "Black Swan" and "Rise of the Planet of the Apes.".

programme.title: Hitsville: The Making of Motown
programme.desc: Motown Records becomes the most successful label of all time after its formation in 1958 Detroit amid racial tension and the burgeoning civil rights movement.

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: When an inner-city Detroit foster mother (Fionnula Flanagan) is murdered in a botched holdup, four of her now-grown adopted children suspect it was no random killing. Rising musician Jack (Garrett Hedlund), former-Marine Angel (Tyrese Gibson), hotheaded hockey player Bobby (Mark Wahlberg) and settled-down husband and father Jeremiah (André Benjamin) go on the hunt for neighborhood criminal kingpin Victor Sweet (Chiwetel Ejiofor) while being trailed themselves by the local beat cops.

programme.title: Michael Jackson's This Is It
programme.desc: Prior to his untimely death, Jackson was in the midst of preparing for a series of sold-out concerts that were scheduled to take place in London during the summer of 2009. Behind-the-scenes footage, filmed between March and June of 2009, captures the pop superstar in intimate detail as he developed and rehearsed for the "This Is It" tour.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: In a Mexico City wracked by a recent wave of kidnappings, ex-CIA operative John Creasy (Denzel Washington) reluctantly accepts a job as a bodyguard for 9-year-old Lupita (Dakota Fanning), the daughter of wealthy businessman Samuel Ramos (Marc Anthony). Just as Creasy begins to develop a fondness for the young girl, a bloodthirsty gunman (Jesús Ochoa) kidnaps her. Now, Creasy must pick off a succession of corrupt cops and criminals to reach his ultimate object of vengeance.

programme.title: Bellator MMA
programme.desc: Phil Davis faces Lyoto Machida in the Bellator 245 main event. From Sept. 11, 2020.

programme.title: Kevin Garnett: Anything Is Possible
programme.desc: Chronicling the career of one of the NBA's all-time greats, featuring scenes from Garnett's induction into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame (New!).

programme.title: Hustle & Flow
programme.desc: DJay (Terrence Howard) is a pimp living day to day on the tough streets of Memphis, Tennessee. Pushing 40, he's tired of the life he's living and dreams of something greater. When he meets up with an old friend who is now in the recording industry, he's inspired to turn his life around and uses his criminal life as an inspiration to create rap music. When he hears that a rap superstar is coming to town, Djay works a hustle to gain the rapper's attention and hopefully get signed by a label.

programme.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
programme.desc: Seeking solace from his dark past, Logan (Hugh Jackman), better known as Wolverine, seems to have found love and contentment with Kayla Silverfox (Lynn Collins). Logan's peaceful existence is shattered when Victor Creed (Liev Schreiber), his vicious brother, brutally murders Kayla. Logan's thirst for revenge propels him into the Weapon X program, where he undergoes a painful procedure to bond his bones with adamantium, making him virtually indestructible and more than a match for Victor.

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: After surviving an assault from a squad of hit men, retired CIA agent Frank Moses (Bruce Willis) reassembles his old team for an all-out war. Frank reunites with old Joe (Morgan Freeman), crazy Marvin (John Malkovich) and wily Victoria (Helen Mirren) to uncover a massive conspiracy that threatens their lives. Only their expert training will allow them to survive a near-impossible mission -- breaking into CIA headquarters.

programme.title: Red 2
programme.desc: Former CIA black-ops agent Frank Moses (Bruce Willis) and his old partner, Marvin Boggs (John Malkovich), are caught in the grip of retirement -- but that soon changes when a powerful Cold War weapon known as Nightshade resurfaces decades after its disappearance. With assassins hot on their trail, Frank and his team set out to find the one scientist (Anthony Hopkins) who can unravel the mystery of Nightshade and help them save themselves -- and the world.

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Mob courier Frank Martin's (Jason Statham) latest assignment pairs him with Valentina (Natalya Rudakova), the cynical daughter of a Ukrainian official. While her father ponders what to do with three boatloads of toxic waste, Frank must guard the problematic woman and prevent her from wandering too far from his vehicle, or risk triggering the explosive shackles they both wear.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Freddie Flintoff, Chris Harris and Paddy McGuinness head to the British Grand Prix for a showdown with a trio of F1's finest drivers. Elsewhere, Paddy pays tribute to the legendary Eddie Kidd OBE (New!).

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Mob courier Frank Martin's (Jason Statham) latest assignment pairs him with Valentina (Natalya Rudakova), the cynical daughter of a Ukrainian official. programme.title: Conan the Barbarian

That soon turns into a an epic battle against evil, for Conan's mortal enemy, Khalar Zym (Stephen Lang), seeks the legendary Mask of Acheron. The artifact will enable Khalar Zym to raise his wife from the dead and achieve immortality for himself, but it will also unleash a malevolent force upon the land, and only Conan and his companions can stop it.

Kidnapping preacher Jacob Fuller (Harvey Keitel) and his kids, the criminals sneak across the border in the family's RV and hole up in a topless bar. Unfortunately, the bar also happens to be home base for a gang of vampires, and the brothers and their hostages have to fight their way out.

programme.desc: Briscoe and Green probe the stabbing death of a young activist who was investigating a beef supplier known for operating in unsanitary conditions.

programme.desc: One luxury of fishing in the lower Florida Keys during the fall is that it becomes a lightly-pressured destination. However, game fish are still here for the taking. Poveromo and Andrew Tipler fish the local shallows and flats around Cudjoe Key.

programme.title: Florida Sportsman Best Boat
programme.desc: We take a look at a boat from each of the most popular categories used in Florida. Depending on what you're fishing for, how you're fishing and with how many people, you'll want to watch this to help you decide what's the best type of boat for you.

programme.title: Reel in the Outdoors

programme.title: The Ultimate Fishing Experience

programme.title: Bob Izumi's Real Fishing

programme.title: Fishing 411
programme.desc: Targeting steelhead using some unorthodox methods in Michigan's Kalamazoo River. Because the Kalamazoo River is slower moving, more turbid and laden with downed timber, back-trolling plugs isn't possible in many stretches.

programme.desc: Deputy Marshal Frank Smeed (Howard Duff) guns down an innocent Mexican who was about to deliver a huge sum of gold to a land tycoon, then makes off with the loot and covers his tracks by claiming that the man he shot was a dangerous criminal.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.sub-title: The Night of the Bubbling Death
programme.desc: West and Gordon set out to recover the stolen U.S. Constitution from a man using it to bargain for a border territory.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.desc: West is ordered to block a Canadian revolutionary's scheme to use violence to establish a personal empire.

programme.title: Last Train From Gun Hill
programme.desc: A marshal's (Kirk Douglas) wife is killed by his best friend's (Anthony Quinn) son, whom he must bring to justice.

programme.title: Posse
programme.desc: A U.S. marshal (Kirk Douglas) tracks an outlaw (Bruce Dern), killing his chance to be a senator from Texas.

programme.title: The Indian Fighter
programme.desc: A frontier scout (Kirk Douglas) leads a wagon train to Oregon, woos a Dakota woman (Elsa Martinelli) and exposes a troublemaker (Walter Matthau).

programme.title: Overland Pacific
programme.desc: A railroad agent takes an assumed identity to investigate several Indian raids.

programme.title: Fury at Showdown
programme.desc: A peace-loving ex-gunfighter is forced to resume carrying a gun when his girlfriend is taken hostage by an outlaw.

programme.title: The King and Four Queens
programme.desc: A drifter (Clark Gable) finds hidden gold in a town where a woman (Jo Van Fleet) lives with the wives of her bank-robber sons.

programme.title: The White Buffalo
programme.desc: Wild Bill Hickok (Charles Bronson) and Chief Crazy Horse (Will Sampson) hunt a legendary white bison.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.desc: Gordon and West interfere with assassins stalking the president of Mexico.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.desc: Gordon and West think they have found Dr. Loveless' corpse, then meet a man claiming to be his uncle.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.sub-title: The Night of the Jack O'Diamonds
programme.desc: The search for a stallion leads West and Gordon to bandits and revolutionaries; guest Frank Silvera.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.desc: West and Gordon hunt for a samurai sword so valuable that its theft means American loss of face with the Japanese.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.desc: West and Gordon brave fires and explosions while following clues to the murder of a rich Kansas rancher.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.desc: West and Gordon try to circumvent the theft of Montezuma's treasure by a phony archaeological expedition.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.sub-title: The Night of the Circus of Death
programme.desc: Gordon and West pursue counterfeiters; guest Florence Sundstrom.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.desc: West and Gordon must stop a gargantuan cannon that pounded one town into dust and is now aimed at Denver.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.desc: A sheriff (Jackie Coogan) asks West and Gordon to save his town from cutthroats.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.sub-title: The Night of the Legion of Death
programme.desc: Gordon and West must stop a territorial governor who rules like a dictator; guest Kent Smith.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.desc: An art collector (John McGiver) plans to turn West against his colleagues.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.sub-title: The Night of the Iron Fist
programme.desc: West and Gordon battle an assortment of characters to extradite a nobleman back to his homeland to face trial.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.sub-title: The Night of the Running Death
programme.desc: Gordon and West join itinerant entertainers while searching for a hired killer; guest Jason Evers.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.desc: An overambitious general plans to use his reputation as an Indian fighter to run for the U.S. presidency.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.sub-title: The Night of the Headless Woman
programme.desc: West and Gordon work to avert the destruction of the American cotton industry by boll weevils smuggled in from abroad.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.desc: West and Gordon struggle to bring to justice a weirdly garbed, artillery-equipped gang of bank robbers.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.sub-title: The Night of the Underground Terror
programme.desc: Former inmates of a Civil War prison camp seek revenge on the commandant; guest Jeff Corey.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.sub-title: The Night of the Death Masks
programme.desc: A murderer (Milton Seltzer), escaped from prison, plans revenge on West.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.desc: West and Gordon encounter voodoo rites and a diabolical biologist and his throng of robot-like slaves.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.desc: West is attacked while guarding a precious cargo of smallpox vaccine and loses his memory from a blow to the head.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.desc: A would-be dictator tries to kill President Grant; guest Wendell Corey.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.sub-title: The Night of the Doomsday Formula

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West

programme.desc: A madman plans to control San Francisco harbor by launching rockets from Alcatraz; guest Khigh Dhiegh.

programme.sub-title: The Night of the Sabatini Death

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.desc: An original melody composed by a fellow secret agent gives West the clue he needs to trap a traitor in the department.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.desc: Gordon and West head to a lonely outpost to battle a terrorist gang.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.sub-title: The Night of the Bleak Island

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.desc: West aids a Russian prince in recovering an all-important icon, sought also by a desperate, dangerous enemy.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West
programme.desc: A plot threatens the directors of a corporation owned by a woman; guest Jo Van Fleet.

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West

programme.title: The Wild, Wild West

programme.title: Country Strong

programme.title: Tales From Zambia
programme.desc: Spend one day and one night in Zambia's Luangwa Valley with Africa's most fearsome hunters-a pride of lions. The lions are hungry because they haven't managed to make a large kill in days and tempers are starting to flare.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons
programme.desc: Vital to the renewal of the landscape and deeply intertwined with the megafauna that tower above it, the industrious dung beetle is nature's ultimate recycler. Delve into the fascinating world of these tireless workers.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: See Amanda and Sophie push boundaries to get a vervet monkey with a broken leg back into the wild, the team is challenged when collaring a four tonne elephant. Alma receives an orphaned, cat-like genet and an antisocial baboon rejoins a troop.

programme.title: Big Cat Country
programme.desc: After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Big Cat Country
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger-especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Big Cat Country
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Deadly Australians
programme.desc: Deep in the Australian forests, lethal predators lie in wait to ambush their prey. Here, Amethystine Pythons lurk high up in the canopy, Tiger Quolls troll the forest floor, and deadly scorpions dwell in the shadows of the undergrowth.

programme.title: Deadly Australians
programme.desc: The waters originating from highland streams flow through varied terrain before emptying into the sea. Along the way, an assortment of environmental niches set the stage for fierce battles between predators and prey.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno
programme.desc: The Arabian Desert is one of the most challenging places on earth, so its inhabitants must be resilient and specialized. Explore the unique adaptations of the unicorn-inspiring Arabian oryx, Ruppell's fox, and the elusive sand cat.

programme.title: Surviving The Amazon
programme.desc: The dry season is the toughest time of year. With lower water levels and less space, animals need to quickly learn new skills to survive...and if they don't, predatory vultures will swoop in for a feast.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia
programme.desc: Spend one day and one night in Zambia's Luangwa Valley with Africa's most fearsome hunters-a pride of lions. The lions are hungry because they haven't managed to make a large kill in days and tempers are starting to flare.

programme.title: Gangs Of Lemur Island
programme.desc: The drought is finally over, but traversing the forest for food is still a gamble. See some leaders take the risk, leaving home territories undefended to feast on a cicada boom. When they return, trespassers are ready for a fight.

programme.title: Gangs Of Lemur Island
programme.desc: As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons
programme.desc: Vital to the renewal of the landscape and deeply intertwined with the megafauna that tower above it, the industrious dung beetle is nature's ultimate recycler. Delve into the fascinating world of these tireless workers.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: See Amanda and Sophie push boundaries to get a vervet monkey with a broken leg back into the wild, the team is challenged when collaring a four tonne elephant. Alma receives an orphaned, cat-like genet and an antisocial baboon rejoins a troop.

programme.title: Wild Rockies
programme.desc: The peaks of the Rocky Mountains are among the highest and harshest on the continent: the air is thin and cold, the terrain is steep, and the trees can't root. Learn how mountain goats, bighorn sheep, and black bears defy these harsh conditions.

programme.title: Wild Rockies
programme.desc: The lakes, rivers, and marshes that pulse through the Rockies sustain an awesome diversity of life. From the inhospitable peaks to teeming ocean deltas, discover how water is the key to keeping all aspects of mountain life thriving.

programme.title: Surviving The Amazon

programme.title: Strange Creatures
programme.desc: Keep your distance from these natural-born killers. Armed with venom and other poisonous tools that make hunting easier (and escape impossible), nudibranches, cuttlefish, giant centipedes, and assassin bugs are all dressed to kill.

programme.title: Strange Creatures
programme.desc: Examine the lives of creatures with really strange skills. From poison-shooting arachnids to ink-bombing octopuses to bifocal-eyed beetles, these animals use their powers to help them defeat predators and ensure their survival.

programme.title: Nature Scenes
programme.desc: One half hour of uninterrupted footage of a zebra calf playing, sleeping and eating in captivity. Watch as its starts to explore the world around it in the beautiful Entabeni Game Reserve in Bosveld, South Africa.

programme.title: Strange Creatures
programme.desc: Dive into the lives of the ocean's weirdest animals. Looking into a whitemargin stargazer fish's eyes can be a shocking experience (literally), while predators hoping to take down a peacock mantis shrimp will be stopped by its vice-like claws.

programme.title: Strange Creatures
programme.desc: Evolution has granted some animals a distinct advantage over their opponents. Investigate the perfect body-part mutations that have given wunderpus octopuses, axolotls, royal spoonbills, aye-ayes, and other creatures an edge.

programme.title: Surviving The Amazon
programme.desc: Every year, more than 200,000 monkeys in Peru are trafficked illegally. Almost all are babies. Watch as these little ones learn to survive without their moms and try to make new friends along the way.

programme.title: Tales From Zambia
programme.desc: In Zambia, no single creature survives in isolation. From lions and leopards to jumping spiders and bee-eating mantises, study the diverse network of animals and plants that makes the Luangwa Valley one of the most magical wildernesses in Africa.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons
programme.desc: Though Africa's three big cats-the lion, leopard, and cheetah-live side by side, each has evolved a specialized set of hunting strategies that keep them from colliding. Take an in-depth look at the lives and stories of these iconic apex predators.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: Join the rescue as Amanda and Mandy try every trick in the book to help a snared hyena, a lion threatens a village, and the team's plan to release a troop of 13 monkeys is thwarted by last minute surgery and some crafty escape artists.

programme.title: Wild Rockies
programme.desc: The peaks of the Rocky Mountains are among the highest and harshest on the continent: the air is thin and cold, the terrain is steep, and the trees can't root. Learn how mountain goats, bighorn sheep, and black bears defy these harsh conditions.

programme.title: Wild Rockies
programme.desc: The lakes, rivers, and marshes that pulse through the Rockies sustain an awesome diversity of life. From the inhospitable peaks to teeming ocean deltas, discover how water is the key to keeping all aspects of mountain life thriving.

programme.title: Nature Scenes
programme.desc: One half hour of uninterrupted footage of a zebra calf playing, sleeping and eating in captivity. Join this baby as it journeys with its mom through the Entabeni Game Reserve in Bosveld, South Africa.

programme.title: Strange Creatures
programme.desc: Crawl along with some of the world's fiercest insects. Watch as giant cockroaches build their immune systems to ensure long life. Then check out the toxic prowess of giant millipedes and the invisibility cloaks of giant prickly stick insects.

programme.title: Strange Creatures
programme.desc: Hiding in plain sight helps many insect, fish, and amphibian species survive. Learn the ins and outs of an array of animal invisibility techniques, such as warning and disruptive colouration, mimicry, and active camouflage.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs
programme.desc: Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of trouble-both on land and in the water.

programme.title: Arabian Seas
programme.desc: The seas are alive with carnivores. Meet the sharks and rays who patrol the coral reefs, hunting down their prey. Learn about toxic fish who disguise themselves to ambush the unwary, and armoured predators who devour vulnerable targets.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons
programme.desc: Life isn't easy for Africa's "big five" megafauna. Lions, leopards, buffalo, rhinos, and elephants face many threats, from competing for food in a limited landscape to avoiding hunters and poachers. Explore the incredible adaptations of each species.

programme.title: Untamed Valley
programme.desc: Secluded and sheltered, away from the hustle and bustle of Zambia's Luangwa River, Kasikizi lagoon is home to a small community of diverse wildlife. At the height of the wet season, it's full to the brim with water - a peaceful spot, ideal for two old male hippos who wallow in its watery depths. The lagoon is their sanctuary, a world away from the more violent life they've left behind at the main river, where they had to face aggressive beachmasters, willing to fight to protect their territory..
